title: Classical Hollywood style today
creator_credit: New York Center for Visual History, KCET (Television station : Los Angeles, Calif.), BBC, Lorna Thomas and Greg Martinelli
brief_description:
Episode number 13 of Series “American cinema”.
This program offers interviews with contemporary directors, European film-makers, scholars, critics and studio-era veterans who probe Hollywood’s influence on both American and world culture.
creator_credit_for_label: New York Center for Visual History, KCET (Television station : Los Angeles, Calif.), BBC, Lorna Thomas and Greg Martinelli
